mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_access_stats ( full_short_url, gid, date, pv, uv, uip, hour, weekday, create_time, update_time, del_flag ) VALUES( #{linkAccessStats.fullShortUrl}, #{linkAccessStats.gid}, #{linkAccessStats.date}, #{linkAccessStats.pv}, #{linkAccessStats.uv}, #{linkAccessStats.uip}, #{linkAccessStats.hour}, #{linkAccessStats.weekday}, NOW(), NOW(), 0 ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE pv = pv + #{linkAccessStats.pv}, uv = uv + #{linkAccessStats.uv}, uip = uip + #{linkAccessStats.uip};
mapper.select: SELECT date, sum( pv ) AS pv, sum( uv ) AS uv, sum( uip ) AS uip FROM t_link_access_stats WHERE full_short_url = #{param.fullShortUrl} AND gid = #{param.gid} AND date BETWEEN #{param.startDate} AND #{param.endDate} GROUP BY full_short_url, gid, date;
